name: PartnerOrder
description:
Create order by posting this from Partner,
with attribute aliases for "Mapping/transformation logic" (i.e., API independent of schema).

Also see Request Events, which inserts metadata tags for LOOKUP of ProductNumbers, given a ProductName.  The "Part of Defined Key" property identifies the fields used for the LOOKUP - see the Subresources Product and Shipper.

Perhaps initiated by code, web hook, UI.... or for our testing, RestLab.
